::Skulletron::

	Skulletron fires another blast but his blast wasn't aimed good as he was
slashed across the chest by Bloodystrike's sword, mech-fluid flying
everywhere.

	"AAGHHH!!! You, you're good!!!"

	Skulletron's anger builds up, and he fires two seeker missiles from his
Seeker Missile gun.
